events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when fab actions are shown/hidden; Captured by v-model directive

model-value.desc: Controls state of fab actions (showing/hidden); Works best with v-model directive, otherwise use along listening to 'update:modelValue' event

direction.description: Direction to expand Fab Actions to

vertical-actions-align.description: The side of the Fab where Fab Actions will expand (only when direction is 'up' or 'down')

persistent.description: By default, Fab Actions are hidden when user navigates to another route and this prop disables this behavior
